segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool is reaching for the cookie jar, and it looks really dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and he’s stretching so far up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he’s going to fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for him to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t seem to care that he’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman hasn’t turned around to see what they’re doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the sink, and she’s just drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s even paying attention at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm, but in here, it’s a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she realizes what’s happening before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
